title: Biting humor
author: VD
content_html:
Gutfeld plays comedian on the Huffington Post:

Little Johnny goes up to his mother and says, “Is it true babies come from storks?” “Why yes,” says the mom. “Do storks ever have abortions?” he asks. The mother stops and laughs and then says, “Yes, but only the poor black ones.”

The funniest part isn’t the jokes, which are designed more to skewer abortion supporters than be humorous, but the reaction of the angry abortionettes and abortioneuters who are simply aghast that this should appear on their adored Huffer Puffer, which isn’t left-wing at all but is moderate and centrist, which is why this crazy and offensive Gutfeld guy should be thrown out into the outer darkness.

Remember when Arianna Hufferopolis said she was conservative? And remember when she was an egocentric jackass and no one took her seriously?

That was awesome!
